outputs.output_descr: Capacity is strengthened to integrate gender equality into policies, action plans and finance mechanisms and to operationalize current gender mandates in UNFCCC policies and programmes
outputs.output_title: Gen resp Glo CC pol making

outputs.output_descr: Promote the sustainability of nat level work under the prog and the operationalization of these efforts, technical support will also be provided to nat partners to develop and/or strengthen existing monitoring, evaluation and financing frameworks.
The GGCA governance mechanisms are effective, transparent and democratic.

project_descr: The goal has been to ensure that climate change policies, programmes and initiatives at all levels are gender-responsive and improve the lives and livelihoods of women and men.
project_title: UNDP Global Gender Responsive Climate Change Programme
